attributes.name: MarketPlace
setTigerCoreContract
getOffer

attributes.documentation:
@notice Get all tigers that are on sale
@return all tokenId's that are currently for sale. Returns an empty arror if none exist

attributes.name: _payTransactionFee
setOffer

buyTiger

devdoc.author: Andrew Ayson
devdoc.details: It takes ownership of the tiger for the duration that it is on the marketplace

buyTiger(uint256).details: Requirement: The msg.value needs to equal the price of _tokenId There must be an active offer for _tokenId

getAllTokenOnSale().return: all tokenId's that are currently for sale. Returns an empty arror if none exist

params._tokenId: the id of the token to get the offer from

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setOffer(uint256,uint256).details: Requirements: Only the owner of _tokenId can create an offer. There can only be one active offer for a token at a time. Marketplace contract (this) needs to be an approved operator when the offer is created.

params._price: the price of the new offer

setTigerCoreContract(address).details: Requirement: Only the contract owner can call.

params._tigerContractAddress: the address of the TigerCore contract to interact with

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: The MarketPlace contract.

_payTransactionFee(uint256).notice: Transfers the transaction fee of 2% to the business account

buyTiger(uint256).notice: Executes the purchase of _tokenId. Sends the funds to the seller and transfers the token using transferFrom in TigerContract.

getAllTokenOnSale().notice: Get all tigers that are on sale

getOffer(uint256).notice: Get the details about a offer for _tokenId. Throws an error if there is no active offer for _tokenId.

setOffer(uint256,uint256).notice: Creates a new offer for _tokenId for the price _price.

setTigerCoreContract(address).notice: Set the current TigerContract address and initialize the instance of TigerContract.
